name: Breu: Shadow Hunt (itch)
description:
BREU: SHADOW HUNT

Live as Marco, a young and skilled blind man, who decides to look for his grandfather after his disapearance. Upon learning that his hat was found, Marco leaves to look up for clues, finding out that he needs to head towards the woods. The first version of the game is available for download for free at: https://breu.itch.io/breu. (Portuguese only)

The second audiogame in the franchise starts exactly where the first game ends, however, it is not necessary to have played BREU or have any prior knowledge of the story to play the second part of the adventure. BREU: Shadow Hunt. In the sequence fend the creatures on the loose that are spread across the city as Marco, our main character, advances deeper and deeper into the woods, where unimaginable dangers and surprising discoveries await him.

In the game, navigate through different areas while you look for clues left from your grandfather. Make new friends, escape the creatures that chase you, and live to the end to find out what is happening with this town.

For a higher immersive experience, try playing with headphones.

We recommend NVDA for a better reading of the menu interfaces.
